snippet: The N.H.L. will increase the number of teams eligible to receive the No. 1 pick in its draft to 14.
abstract: NHL will increase number of teams eligible to receive the No 1 draft pick to 14.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. will increase the number of teams eligible to receive the No. 1 pick in its draft to 14.

headline.seo: More N.H.L. Teams Get Shot at No. 1 Draft Pick
headline.main: More N.H.L. Teams Get Shot at No. 1 Draft Pick
